name: Regenerating
description: Restores Vitality per turn, healing the living and dealing physical damage to the undead.

name: Fortified
description:
Maximum Physical Armor increased.
Physical Armor: +??
Immunity to being teleported.

name: Mending Metal
description: Restores Physical Armor per turn.

name: Rested
description:
Character's primary attributes increased. Protects from Muted, Blind, Crippled, Knocked Down.
Strength +2
Finesse: +2
Intelligence: +2

name: Hasted
description:
Character is hasted.
Movement: +2
Start AP: +1
AP Recovery: +1

name: Clear-Minded
description:
Increases Strength: +?? (Scales, starting with +1)
Finesse: +?? (Scales, starting with +1)
Intelligence: +?? (Scales, starting with +1)
Wits: +?? (Scales, starting with +2)
Accuracy: +20%
Protected from mind-controlling effects.
Protects against and removes Blinded, Terrified, Charmed, Taunted, Sleeping, Enraged and Mad.

name: Permafrost
description:
A sheet of impenetrable ice protects character from incoming damage, but they are unable to act while it is active.
All Resistances: +100% (Including Piercing and Physical)
Immunity to Burning
Immunity to Stunned
Immunity to Poisoned
Immunity to Charmed
Immunity to Terrified
Immunity to Bleeding
Immunity to Petrified
Immunity to Taunted
Immunity to Sleeping
Immunity to Shocked
Immunity to Shackles of Pain

name: Soothing Cold
description: Restores Magic Armor per turn.

name: Magic Shell
description: Maximum Magic Armor increased.

name: Charmed
description: Temporarily turns the target's allegiance around. (Your character can be charmed to attack your party). Resisted by Magic Armor.

name: Soul Mate
description:
Caster: Character is copying 50% of healing and Armor restoration to linked character.
Target: Character is receiving healing and Armor restoration from linked character.

name: Blessed
description:
Protects against Diseased, Decaying Touch, Petrified, Stunned.
Accuracy +20%
Dodging +10%
Resistances: +15%

name: Farsight
description:
Character's accuracy and range of ranged weapons and skills are increased. The range increase is 3m.
Accuracy: +50%

name: Evading
description:
Dodging and movement speed increased.
Movement: +20%
Dodging: +90%

name: Steam Lance
description: MISSING INFO

name: Skin Graft
description: MISSING INFO

name: Enraged
description: Character is enraged. Critical hits are guaranteed, but character is Muted and can only use weapon skills.

name: Infected
description: Contagious (can spread to nearby players/enemies)

name: Madness
description:
This character has been driven mad. While in this state, they will attack friend and foe alike.
Maddened characters will attack those nearest them, regardless of alignment.

name: Breathing Bubble
description: Allows you to ignore effects of cloud surfaces and making them immune to Suffocation and Silence.
